The claim that Rep: Trey Gowdy was given the highest level of security clearance possible with an executive order from the President himself is false.
The White House: s log of presidential actions does not list any executive order granting Gowdy the highest level of security clearance.
The Federal Register: s lists of executive orders in 2017 and 2018 also do not include any such order.
Members of Congress already have access: and Gowdy is also a member of the House intelligence committee.
